abstract: Hillary Clinton, preparing for large outdoor campaign rally in New York City, will address latest criticism by reassuring voters that she plans to battle for interests of the middle class; plans to evoke legacy of Franklin D Roosevelt and the New Deal.
lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton is expected to draw on the legacy of the New Deal at a rally Saturday in New York, where she will try to make her case for why she should be president.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Will Evoke Roosevelt and Try to Ease Fears on Trust in New York Speech
headline.print_headline: At New York Rally, Clinton Will Evoke Roosevelt and Try to Ease Fears on Trust

snippet: Mrs. Clinton is expected to draw on the legacy of the New Deal at a rally Saturday in New York, where she will try to make her case for why she should be president.

keywords.value: Roosevelt, Franklin D, Four Freedoms Park (Manhattan, NY)
keywords.name: glocations
